Name: Statuette of Ptah-Sokar-Osiris
Description: Mummiform statuette of Ptah-Sokar-Osiris, crowned with the double feather, a solar disc and horns. The god is wearing a  close-fitting tunic, which is black in colour with an ochre band in the middle and a wesekh-collar in the following colours: yellow, red, white, blue, green and black. On the back a vertical inscription can be distinguished with the signs in black. The figure is mounted on a base, decorated in green, off-white and red, at the end of which is a cavity, closed off by the figure of a falcon with the solar disc on its head.
